title: Creamy Wild Rice and Chicken Soup
ingredients: ['1L chicken stock', '500ml water', '2 cooked, boneless chicken breast fillets, shredded', '125g wild rice', '2 sprigs thyme', '1 bay leaf', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '100g plain flour', '100g butter', '500ml double cream']
